title: 2019 Championship Weekend Preview
itunes:title: 2019 Championship Weekend Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling and Gregg Rosenthal preview Championship Weekend starting with the Packers and 49ers. (5:02) The stop half way to discuss Luke Kuechly retiring and the latest Odell Beckham drama. (28:51)The heroes finish up the show by previewing the Titans and Chiefs. (44:54)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
